storyInfo: The sisters duel across countless paintings until finally Saga appears to interrupt the sisterly conflict. With Lava and her cohorts' intervention, Dusk seems at least temporarily convinced by Nian.

attributes.content: You're extremely bad-tempered, you don't ever talk, you get mad all of a sudden, and your attitude is completely terrible. No wonder I, your own sister, am the only one willing to take care of you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You don't get along with that silly wordsmith, because you two don't accept that both word and art rose from the same source. You don't get along with me, because you don't wanna try hotpot that's even a little bit spicyâ€”
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: *sigh*, if you ever come up with those silly dishes like Metal Crab ice cream pot again, I really won't have a clue what to do with you.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Enough talk.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I'm guessing you're trying to drag this out by spewing nonsense because you're exhausted already?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: ...Eh, you haven't gotten even a bit of shut-eye all these years?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Pulling an all-nighter may help you keep a clear head better than losing a couple hours of sleep, but the fatigue adds up and wears you out.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh, I get it. You're scared.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Grr...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You know yourself better than anyone. And you know you're part of the painting, too. And you're afraid you'll cease to exist when you wake up.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Shut up!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Oh, calm down.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: We all need to face the truth about ourselves. That's not something we can run from.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Tsk.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I didn't know you could get this sentimental. Perhaps you got a little too much sleep?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: By the time 'we' wake up and gaze upon this world, both you and I as we exist right now will disappear, without a trace.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Not only that, 'we' will set this whole world ablaze with our flames of rage. The humiliation and resentment inside me will burn as well, up until the moment 'our' ties are cut.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And I won't be particularly happy about that.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...You'll resist it?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Nonsense. How will you, a mere part of the body, take on the whole?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Eh, I think I used that analogy before.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Enough of your smooth talk. We don't have timeâ€”
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Yeah, I know. I'm not the only one who thinks this way. Before 'we'â€”Actually, I guess since we've broken it off with those lunatics, it's not really 'we' anymoreâ€”
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: â€”Before 'it' awakens, we need to be fully prepared. We have to be able to do this, no matter what kind of strength we need to borrow.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: And we aren't doing this for anything. It's only for ourselves and the things we love.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Also, I'm sure you noticed... Some of our siblings are on our side, some don't care, and there are some... who are absolute nut jobs.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...Impossible.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Really? Don't you actually have a few ideas about who those nut jobs are?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: They're all close to the True Lung. What chance do they... No... That's not right...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: What are you doing, being more confused than I am? Just take a look back at our long history. How many times have you seen so much as a peep out of those guys?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: These days, even the big shots who like to throw their weight around send their Messengers to lounge in that little temple's side hall... It's not gonna fool me, and it's not gonna fool anyone.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Shackles can't keep you down now, can they? If not, then what makes you think anything can keep the others down?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Anyway, we really don't have much time left. It doesn't matter who drove us into this corner, there's just no time.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Do you remember the last time you had a good night's sleep?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh, man, that was close. You really don't think much of your art, do you? You painted these yourself! And to think you were just lecturing me about that.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Enough nonsense.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Guessing you're not gonna admit it?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...Not necessarily. What you just said is worth giving a little thought to.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: But what does any of that have to do with the 'Rhodes Island' place? What does that have to do with what it is you want to accomplish?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You could go check it out yourself. It's a great place.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...A fair amount of us have already come to accept this fate.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: We'll disappear, and it will awaken. We will become I anew, before we all cease to exist as the destruction of the great Yan cities rings in the air.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Is there any point in that...?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: That's the answer you came up with after all these years? A little too sappy, don't you think? What happened to the haughty, arrogant Dusk I remember?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ah, whatever. If this goes on, we'll run out of paintings to mess up. Hmphâ€”
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Wait, not againâ€”
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Oh, check this out. This is top of the line. It's eight feet wide, three-and-a-half tall, ignited with materials never before seen in Terraâ€”My beloved two-step firecracker!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...Tch.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Yo, we're back!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Nian!
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: My benefactor, there seems to be a burnt smell lingering in the air...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: ...Nian's winking at us. We should probably stay away. Nothing good comes of that.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Well, I've said all there is to say. I tried to reason with you, even. What do you think?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I told you right from the start.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: What good does locking yourself away in the paintings do anyway?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Come with me to Rhodes Island. It'll be just as fun there. Let's get the other guys and, hey, we can have a little family reunion over at Rhodes.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Then we can really suss out our sisterly issues, along with the rest.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Rhodes Island... What does that place have that's worth your persistence?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: And you want to bring everyone there? Ha, that's more absurd than us declaring war on Yan right now.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: If you won't come willingly, I can't just stand here and watch you lose your mind and disappear without a peep.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: That's your problem.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Ugh, don't tell me we're gonna have to fight this one out?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: That's your problem too. Dueling is incredibly boring, and, as a way to resolve differences, it went out of fashion centuries ago.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: ...But I will say that you've really gotten under my skin today.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Lava?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Uhh?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Stay away. Get off the mountain and go somewhere else.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What's about to go down, there's no room for you guys to interfereâ€”
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hm? Where am I...?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: â€”Ohh? Have I returned already?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Hm? Is that not Lava? Kroos and Mr. Nothing, too.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Hoh, my good sirâ€”And who might this be? Oh, art thou perchance the master's sister? My, my, 'tis a pleasure to meet thee!
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: My name is Saga, a wandering monk from the far lands of Higashi!
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Hah... This is getting interesting.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Uh, why the suspicious stare, may I ask? Oh, mayhaps there is rice on my face...?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Rice?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I had a magnificent vegetarian feast with many a great number of myself. Verily, the taste brought me back. It hath left me the most satisfied!
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: How did you...?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Beg pardon?
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: How did you... leave my scroll?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I am afraid I know not how. I merely returned.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: All I recall is that the first person whom I met is me as I am now, and the last person whom I met is also me as I am right now. Everything that occurred between is but a faint haze, likely my random thoughts.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: I walked alongside myself, the me in the painting, sharing conversations unto today, and we walked from Yan all the way back to the monastery.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: The moment I swung the door open and entered, I remembered my head priest's painting and the words he spoke as he lamentedâ€”
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Lamented?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: He said, 'The mountains are but mountains, and the water is yet water.'
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Just then, I noticed there was but a mirror in front of me. In the blink of mine eye, I found myself here.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: One final note, I must admit that the other me, having become a heavy gambler, did rather frighten me. It seems I must not take up gambling.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Heh, no wonder. Looks like your master reasoned with you just as much as I did, that little punk of a monk...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: He never saw in the scroll anything he saw in life... so it was just mountains and waters to him, hmph.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Don't be such a sore loser, my little sister. You're embarrassing yourself.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You were woken twice, but your perceptiveness and reasoning... is rather beyond my expectations.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Remember how we made a bet a long, long, loooong time ago?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You lost.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh, don't even try to deny it. I know there's way more than one person who made it through the boundaries of your imagination. I will let the prior ones slide, but this happened right before my eyes.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You can stop blowing your own horn just because you're right. It'll be the end of you one day.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Remember what I said. There are always ways to turn things around.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Turn things around...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Fine. Very well... You won.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: There's no point in making a stand over this... I'll just stand by and see how far you can take it.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I guarantee you're in for a surprise, my good little sister.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Lava, nice work.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Uh, your sister doesn't seem very happy. Should we just leave her alone?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Oh, she's fine... She's locked herself away in the paintings for years. Having to deal with this many people is probably asking too much from her right now.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Just pretend she's got some anxiety disorder, or that she's shy.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh, if you're trying to strike up a conversation, you're just gonna get yelled up, Nothing bro. You don't want to bring that on yourself.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: A-Alright.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: ...So, I guess that wraps up the mission?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: How did you get here anyway...?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I've got my ways...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What's our next step?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Find ourselves a car or something and head back to Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Might as well take a few stops on the way to get grub. Make it a fun road trip.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Kuo-wu is known for its fine, exquisite food. If you ask me, though, I think they're tasteless and boringâ€”
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: â€”Blasphemy. You'll find no finer delicacy than the scalebass here toward the end of autumn. They are plump and delicious, the perfect complement to the green mountains and rivers around us.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: ...Oh, scalebass is fine, but it's no match for a hotpot paired with booze.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Heh, I should have the kid show you how wrong you are. The broad variety of Yan cuisine will open your eyes.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Even hotpot is a subject of study and debate. Given how... quick with the tongue you are, I can't imagine you being an expert on the subject.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Oh, open my eyes? That's a bit rich, coming from someone who eats nothing but ink.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Please, I wouldn't dare to lecture anyone on cuisine. Look at what you are wearing, though. It reminds me of freshly planted chilies.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: H-Hey, let's stop it, okay? And here I thought you two finally calmed down! Kroos, help me out here.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I just looked up the route back. We're gonna hit seventeen restaurants well-known for their local specialties. This will do, right?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Yeah, I suppose it'll work.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: ...Hmph.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: My benefactors! My benefactors! Uh, I have something I would like to mention.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What is it now? You're acting so weird, it's freaking me out...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Well, you see, I was hoping to make my way to Lungmen to find myself a job, but it appears you are all employed by this... 'Rhodes Island.' Is this island maybe hiring?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: I can do anything! I am healthy and hale, quite ripped even! And I most certainly am not afraid of the Infected! I guarantee you'll get your money's worth!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Uh... you could come with us and take the exams, but I can't really promise you anything...
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Very well, then please allow me to accompany you on your journey!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: This is turning into a real party.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Master.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I shall never forget the time I spent within thy scrolls.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: You needn't remember it.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I am afraid these memories will stay with me for the rest of my life. Unlike thee, life is short for me.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: You have my pity.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: How's your master now...?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: My head priest yet lives. Though he is already a century and a score in age, thou wilt find him quite hale and healthy.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: So you're going with them?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: No, I am afraid not... I wish to continue my travels far and wide, leaving Yan behind.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: I have a dream.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: Be that as it may, Lava has been a kind friend. Surely, this Rhodes Island must be a place of many fascinations. Should we have the chance, I wish to pay it a visit.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: I am afraid I know not when that will be, however.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: ...Heh. Isn't that nice? You guys have that privilege now.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Why, I quite envy thee instead, Master Dusk. Thou need not take a step outside to enjoy the fine landscapes even thousands of miles away.
attributes.name: Saga

attributes.content: If you've seen as many mountains as I have, life isn't going to be that much more interesting, no matter how many thousands of miles you travel.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Crude mounts utmost risen.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: If you ever meet him again, tell him: this one extra stroke wasn't bad.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Mr. Nothing, there's been a car tailing us for a while, right?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Looks like they're here for you. Need any help?
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: I won't trouble you so... Allow me to take care of this myself.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: What happened to the promise to your master?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Why, I needn't use the fan to take care of these hooligans!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: If they dare do evil beyond the city gates under broad daylight, then there truly is no law and order left in this world! I'll teach them a lesson todayâ€”
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Look, there's two more cars now.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Some of them have weapons too. Looks like they're bent on making a ruckus.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: ...M-My benefactors?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Lava

attributes.content: Well, if they mean us harm... Let's do this.
attributes.name: Lava
